**Let's Do Digital** has been a centre for safe and open discussion and learning around digital health since 2022. We have had two great conferences and several webinars to date. 

## Updates

23/04/24 - Registration for this year's **Let's Talk Digital Conference** is now open. Sign up [here](/conferences/2024/index.qmd).

19/04/24 - We have had lots of interest for an evening coding session. So we built one. See details [here](/tickets/programming-in-healthcare-module-1-July-2024.qmd).

18/04/24 -  Tickets are also open for the first (of many) of the "Ask a Clinician" series. Find out more [here](/tickets/ask-a-clinician-1.qmd).

18/04/24 - Our first **{{< var coding-series-title >}} course** is now open to registration. Please find further details about the course and registration [here](/tickets/programming-in-healthcare-module-1-June-2024.qmd).
